column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We came here on a Saturday night at around 9:30
column2: the place looked pretty busy but it was only a 30 min wait. The ambiance is pretty modern and inviting
column3: they have 2 big community tables in the middle of the room and smaller tables around the room. The staff is friendly
column4: attentive and fast. We order the Jinya tonkutso and the spicy chicken ramens. They were both very good. The broths were creamy and flavorful. We also tried the salmon sashimi and the tempura shrimp
column5: they were fresh and nicely flavored. Overall
column6: we had a great experience and would be coming back to try other dishes.
